sections.content:
Question:
Does RH850/F1KM-S2 support code flash background operation (BGO)?
Answer:
Yes, RH850/F1KM-S2 supports code flash background operation (BGO). User can run application code in one black of 1MB code flash area and erase/program the other 1MB code flash area. Please refer to hardware user's manual for details.
Suitable Products
RH850/F1Kx
